useCase.name: Perform Compaction Operation
useCase.description: As an AppDeveloper, I want to perform compaction on a Dataset Instance through a CLI tool.

preconditions.precondition: The Dataset Instance is available and accessible through the Dataset Management System.

successEndConditions.condition: The compaction operation on the Dataset Instance was successful.

useCase.trigger: AppDeveloper triggers the compaction operation using the CLI Tool.

mainSequence.step: AppDeveloper performs the compaction operation via the CLI Tool.
CLI Tool requests the compaction operation on the Dataset Instance from the Dataset Management System.
Dataset Management System executes the compaction operation on the Dataset Instance.
Dataset Instance successfully completes the compaction operation.
Dataset Management System confirms the success of the operation to the CLI Tool.
CLI Tool displays a success message to the AppDeveloper.
